columns.name: BUR_ALEAT_T
columns.description: Hospital identifier for acute care hospitals

columns.name: JAHR
columns.description: Year of the data point (year when survey was carried out)

columns.name: typologie.f
columns.description: Hospital type (e.g., university hospital, cantonal hospital), categorized based on original TYPOL99 codes
manipulation_steps: Mapped TYPOL99 codes to specific hospital types.

columns.name: month_wageFTE_nurses
columns.description: Mean monthly salary for nurses per full-time equivalent per hospital
derived_from: typo_ks_fibu_2014-2020 dataset, variable LOHN_PFLEGE and typo_ks_personal_2014-2020 dataset, variable MA_FTE for nurses
manipulation_steps: Aggregated FTE data by hospital and year for nurses (sum)
Merged FTE data with the hospital data containing wage expences information
Calculated annual wage/FTE by dividing the total hospital expences for wages by the respective FTE for nurses
Divided annual salary by 13 to get monthly salary

columns.name: month_wageFTE_physicians
columns.description: Mean monthly salary for physicians per full-time equivalents per hospital
derived_from: typo_ks_fibu_2014-2020 dataset, variable LOHN_ARZT and typo_ks_personal_2014-2020 dataset, variable MA_FTE for physicians
manipulation_steps: Aggregated FTE data by hospital and year for physicians (sum)
Merged FTE data with the hospital data containing wage expences information
Calculated annual wage/FTE by dividing the total hospital expences for wages by the respective FTE for physicians
Divided annual salary by 13 to get monthly salary

columns.name: age.mean_nurse
columns.description: Mean age of nurses per hospital
manipulation_steps: Mean age of nurses was calculated by aggregating the age data of nurses for each hospital and year

columns.name: age.mean_physician
columns.description: Mean age of physicians per hospital
manipulation_steps: Mean age of physicians was calculated by aggregating the age data of physicians for each hospital and year

columns.name: pct.female_nurse
columns.description: Percentage of female nurses per hospital
manipulation_steps: The percentage of female nurses was calculated by grouping the dataset by hospital and year
For each group, the proportion of nurses identified as
was computed using the mean function (dplyr package)

columns.name: pct.female_physician
columns.description: Percentage of female physicians per hospital
manipulation_steps: The percentage of female physicians was calculated by grouping the dataset by hospital and year
For each group, the proportion of physicians identified as
was computed using the mean function (dplyr package)

columns.name: pct.chief_leading
columns.description: Percentage of nurses and physicians in leadership positions

columns.name: pct.attending_hospital
columns.description: Percentage of nurses and physicians attending hospital

columns.name: pct.residents_students
columns.description: Percentage of medical residents and students

columns.name: pct.RNs_etc
columns.description: Percentage of Registered Nurses and similar positions

columns.name: pct.LPNs
columns.description: Percentage of Licensed Practical Nurses

columns.name: pct.n_ass
columns.description: Percentage of nurses in assistant roles

columns.name: pct.CH_nurse
columns.description: Percentage of nurses with a diploma from Switzerland

columns.name: pct.CH_physician
columns.description: Percentage of physicians with a diploma from Switzerland

columns.name: pct.origin_dipl_CH_nurse
columns.description: Percentage of nurses with a diploma from Switzerland

columns.name: pct.origin_dipl_CH_physician
columns.description: Percentage of physicians with a diploma from Switzerland

columns.name: pct.origin_dipl_notCH_nurse
columns.description: Percentage of nurses with a non-Swiss diploma

columns.name: pct.origin_dipl_notCH_physician
columns.description: Percentage of physicians with a non-Swiss diploma

columns.name: equipment
columns.description: Equipment expenditure data for hospitals
manipulation_steps: Extracted equipment expenditure from raw data

columns.name: AMBULANTE_KONSULTATIONEN
columns.description: ambulatory consultations data
manipulation_steps: Extracted data on ambulatory consultations from raw data
